attributes.action: ban fixed odds betting terminals in betting shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: fixed odds betting terminals are the (crack cocaine)of gambling.they are allegedly a randomly generated numbers game, that is untrue,its impossible to be random if its run on a retention basis.if the machine is in a (paying out)window it will land on which ever number youve selected,if its on a retaining window it is impossible to win.the vast majority of people dont understand the concept of fixed odds betting terminals,the word fixed should sound alarm bells,id like to see an independant commision research this subject,before even more people get addicted to these vulgar life ruining machines,this problem is huge,and it affects man woman and child,be it professional,unemployed,these machines will exploit any persons addictive weakness ,and i call for them to be banned........
